item.title: I3 configuration
item.description: My attempt on switching to a window manager (I3). I was on a pretty old laptop (GL752V), probably why I faced a handful of issues. Distro used: EndeavourOS. config file path: ~/.config/i3/config Changes made: Change open file explorer from ctrl+n to ctrl+e Make brightness key work. (See fix i3wm brightness) Resize feature with mod + ctrl + arrow keys. Ensure power button work. Make alt+F4 work as well, other than $mod + q.

item.title: Google search highlighted text
item.description: #!/bin/bash # Google search the highlighted text (requires: xdg-utils, xsel) xdg-open "[https://google.com/search?q=$(xsel)](https://google.com/search?q=$(xsel))" Bind it to a shortcut key, mine is super + s.

item.title: Davinci Resolve Shortcut Mappings
item.description: CTRL + ALT + K to access preference. Split Change from Ctrl + \ to “S” Start to playhead and End to playhead. CTRL + SHIFT + [ to “Q” and “W” Remember to remove keybindings for the affected shortcut.

item.title: Resolve HEVC (H265) In Davinci Resolve
item.description: Download the HEVC extension and install it from: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/19FWeAVWFoZUaM-14Wbt3t9lb_bIprl8b Press Win + R on your keyboard to launch the Run dialog box.Type WSReset.exe in the dialog box and press Enter. Open Microsoft Store, click the Library icon. This will be on the left side of the Store app.Check for Microsoft Store Updates. Click the Get updates button to check for available updates.If updates are available, click Update all to download and install them.

item.title: Change Timezone in Linux
item.description: View current timezone: timedatectl List timezones: timedatectl list-timezones Change timezone example: sudo timedatectl set-timezone Europe/Dublin

item.title: Automount Windows drive in Linux
item.description: Find out where the windows drive is located: lsblk Edit fstab file: sudo nvim /etc/fstab For example, sdb2: # <file system> <mount point> <type> <options> <dump> <pass>``` /dev/sdb2 /media/data ntfs defaults 0 0 Reboot the system: reboot Create a launcher.
